author: charub
body:
Resolving lzybkr/PSReadLine#430.

This happens because module prefix is used when comparing 2 cmdlets.
For example: Microsoft.PowerShell.PSReadLine.dll\Get-PSReadlineOption
and PSReadLine\Get-PSReadlineOption are treated as different cmdlets.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
I tested this fix and the original bug still reproduces.
I also tried the test added in Windows PowerShell and it passes (returns 2 results).
So these might be fixing a real issue, but not the issue mentioned, nor do we have a new test that demonstrates the fix.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: This doesn't seem to fix the problem, and looks a bit risky for what seems to be a corner case with modules. We can revisit these changes if the PR is updated with code that fixes the tab completion issue.

title: Fix ambiguous tab completion for some cmdlets (lzybkr/PSReadLine#430)
